name: fingerlickin  good  pork chops
instructions: dredge pork chops in mixture of flour , salt , dry mustard and garlic powder, brown in oil in a large skillet, place browned pork chops in a crock pot, add the can of soup , undiluted, cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours
ingredients: lean pork chops, flour, salt, dry mustard, garlic powder, oil, chicken rice soup
